channel.title: How to make a sucessfull post in Server downloads
channel.description:
[center]How to be sucessfull in posts and rep++ :)[/center]
[center]1. Post pictures![/center] [center][img]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/8084/exampleb.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]2.Give details![/center] [center]Give details to your source/pictures/ and client.[/center]
[center]3. Use videos![/center] [center]Make sure you use videos to give information on your source before they download.[/center]
[center]4. Use emotions! [optional][/center] [center]Use emotions it just makes things look better :)[/center]
If you follow these 4 steps you well have a sucessfull post. Also If you think this topic should be stickied please reply and say "your rate and wheather it should be stickied or not" Thank you!

item.title: How to make a sucessfull post in Server downloads
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

We really don’t need anything telling us how to make a ‘successful’ post (which you didn’t even spell correctly).

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a sucessfull post in Server downloads

item.title: How to make a sucessfull post in Server downloads
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Green Mr. Green
item.description:
@Mr_Green wrote:

Exuse me Alec please do not report me I am just helping everyone else because I’ve seen a lot of servers without pictures or details so the post is useless get it? so with this it will help a lot and less useless posts

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a sucessfull post in Server downloads
